channel.title: Projects on Mengyue Han
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Mengyue Han

item.title: HW3 : Informative visualizations about malaria
item.description: In this assignment, I will create 3 informative visualizations about malaria data using Python. Source data and code Malaria dataset contains three tables: Malaria incidence and deaths by country, deaths by age across the world and time. You can access to the source code for visualizations here: Github Informative visualizations 1. Malaria deaths across time in China I created a lineplot using seaborn to depict the overall death caused by malaria from 1990-2015 in China.

item.title: HW2 : Solve three problems from Euler Project
item.description: In this assignment, I will solve 3 problems from the Euler Project using Python. You can access the source code here: https://github.com/zhhmyz/BIOS-823 Problem 13: Large Sum Work out the first ten digits of the sum of the following one-hundread 50-digit numbers. Solved by 225065 Link: https://projecteuler.net/problem=13 nums = """ one-hundred 50-digit numbers """" def large_sum(a): """Sum 50-digit numbers and return the first ten digits Parameters ---------- a : string A one-hundred numbers string that is separated by '\n' Returns ------- int First ten digits of the calculation """ a = a.
